org.drip.analytics.holiday

Class Variable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.holiday.Base
        • org.drip.analytics.holiday.Variable

  • public class Variable
extends Base
    This class contains the floating holiday’s month, day in week, and week in month. Will be generated with an optional adjustment for weekends in a given year.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
